subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Share your stories for the press...?
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
This is a good point. We have no way of knowing if some of who we talk  
to aren't as "alive" as we are. :)

w.
On Dec 3, 2008, at 11:16 AM, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> I have met other entities who are alive...as alive as you and I; but  
> yet their are on an entirely different dimension.  A dimension of  
> great violence and destruction. All that these events like w and I  
> have experienced tells us that consciousness is basically non- 
> localized in nature. Consciousness exists in some form in different  
> dimensions.
>
> I fully agree with w, keep your mind open and always expect the  
> unexpected!
>
> Al
>
